page.title: 11BARGOED - WORK IN THE FUTURE
page.content: FUTURE PROSPECTS FOR WORK IN THE BARGOED AREA. The lack of any major sites for industrial development in Bargoed itself means limited local employment opportunities and so there is considerable daily commuting out from the Bargoed area towards Cardiff, Newport, Bridgend and other industrial areas of South Wales. The future seems bleak. Young people must look further afield and be prepared to travel for jobs. There is a positive drain of population from the area at the present time.
